name: Erased (BlackGames)
description:
The Game

"Erased"  is a psychological horror video game in which you will play the role of a person suffering from a series of psychological disorders such as schizophrenia and persecution mania. During the game you will have to carry out some tasks and investigate the environment in which you find yourself.

Controls
  • E - Starts an interaction with objects (doors, drawers, paintings...). It also let the player place items in the pentagram.
  • F - Finish the interaction with the objects.
  • Left Mouse Button - Pickup and release objects.
Features
  • The purpose of the game is to convey a series of messages to society, criticising various issues such as mental disorders, such as schizophrenia, persecutory mania...
How to play

You need to complete various tasks presented in the game, either by interacting with the environment or through the environment's narrative.
